main event: The observer sighted a round object that appeared to hover or suspend near his car for about 15 minutes before speeding away.
interesting points: The observed object was round and gave off a faint glow,The observer noted that the object did not resemble balloons or airplanes due to the absence of blinking lights or sound,The observer felt that there were three similar objects at the sighting location,The observer returned to the area after the sighting and reported additional similar observations,The sighting lasted approximately 15 minutes.
witness description: the observer returned to the area after the initial sighting and reported consistent observations
